parameters.name: searchCategoryType
parameters.description: The asset type to search within.

schema.description:
This represents a "subset" of Toolbox.Service.CategoryType options and represent the full set
of "categories" (or asset types) that can be searched upon from the toolbox search API.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search terms used to filter the results.

parameters.name: modelSubTypes
parameters.description: When searching for models, the subtypes associated with the search results.

parameters.name: excludedModelSubTypes
parameters.description: When searching for models, the subtypes not associated with the search results.

parameters.name: creator
parameters.description: Deprecated: Please refer to the 'userId' and 'groupId' properties instead. The creator type and ID. E.g. "user/123" or "group/456"

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The User ID of the creator. Only one of 'userId' and 'groupId' can be present in a query.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: The Group ID of the creator. Only one of 'userId' and 'groupId' can be present in a query.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The identifier for the desired search results page. Only one of 'pageNumber' and 'pageToken' can be present in a query.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve, starting from 0. Only one of 'pageNumber' and 'pageToken' can be present in a query.

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: The number of assets to be returned. Cannot be larger than 100.

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: The sort direction of the search results.

schema.description: Represents the direction in which to sort the results

parameters.name: sortCategory
parameters.description: The category to sort the search results by.

schema.description: The category to sort the search results by.

parameters.name: audioMinDurationSeconds
parameters.description: When searching for audio, the minimum duration of the audio assets. If included, must be greater than or equal to 0.

parameters.name: audioMaxDurationSeconds
parameters.description: When searching for audio, the maximum duration of the audio assets. If included, must be greater than or equal to 0.

parameters.name: audioArtist
parameters.description: When searching for audio, the artist name of the audio assets.

parameters.name: audioAlbum
parameters.description: When searching for audio, the album name of the audio assets.

parameters.name: audioTypes
parameters.description: When searching for audio, the type of the audio assets.

parameters.name: includedInstanceTypes
parameters.description: When searching for models, this filters that the following [Instance](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/Instance) types are included in the model.

parameters.name: includeOnlyVerifiedCreators
parameters.description: Whether the results should only include assets created by verified creators.

parameters.name: minPriceCents
parameters.description: The minimum price of the asset in cents. If included, must be greater than or equal to 0.

parameters.name: maxPriceCents
parameters.description: The maximum price of the asset in cents. If included, must be greater than or equal to 0.

parameters.name: facets
parameters.description: Additional keywords to query by.

parameters.name: searchView
parameters.description: Indicates which fields will be populated in the response.

schema.description:
This view controls which fields are populated in the search response. A lighter
view will result in faster response times and higher reliability.

parameters.name: musicChartType
parameters.description: Indicates which music charts to filter from.

schema.description: Represents which music chart to pull entries from, if any

get.description: Get details for a single Creator Store asset.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The asset ID to retrieve details for.

id.description: The unique identifier of the asset.

assetTypeId.description: The type that the asset belongs to.

socialLinks.description: The social links associated with the asset.

previewAssets.description: The asset's preview asset ids grouped by asset type.

createTime.description: The time the asset was created.

updateTime.description: The time the asset was last updated.

categoryPath.description:
Category Path of the asset, if it exists.
e.g. "3d__characters"

durationSeconds.description: The duration of the audio file in seconds.

audioType.description: The type of audio (Music or SoundEffect).

CorrectionState.description: Determines the state of the Toolbox response depending on spell checking status and the input arguments.

creator.description:
Deprecated: Please refer to the 'userId' and 'groupId' properties instead.
The creator type and ID. E.g. user/123 or group/456.

userId.description: The User ID of the creator. Required if the asset is individual-user-owned.

groupId.description: The Group ID. Required if the asset is group-owned.

CreatorStoreAsset.description: Representation of a creator store asset.

purchasePrice.description: The price of the asset, including the currency code.

purchasable.description: Whether or not the asset can be purchased in the Creator Store.

CreatorStoreProduct.description: The asset's creator store product information.

textureId.description: The texture id of the decal.

searchDebugInfo.description: Gets or sets the search infra debug info

HomeAssetsResponse.description: Response from the HomeController's Assets endpoints

libraryQueryOptions.description: Class passed to ToolboxItemStore when querying

ImageSearchStatus.description: Enum representing possible outcomes of image search

InstanceCounts.description:
Represents the count of various instance types within an asset.
See [Instance](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/Instance).

LibraryQueryOptions.description: Class passed to ToolboxItemStore when querying

meshId.description: The mesh id of the meshpart.

textureId.description: The texture id of the meshpart.

subTypes.description: The subtypes that the model belongs to.

scriptCount.description: The number of scripts that are in the model.

objectMeshSummary.description: The summary of the meshes within the model, if they exist.

instanceCounts.description:
The number of studio Instance types in the model.
See [Instance](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/Instance).
These are broken down into specific types, such as MeshPart, Part, Script,
Tool, Animation, etc.

ModelInstanceType.description: A list of model instance types. See Toolbox.Service.Models.Internal.InstanceCounts and [Instance](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/Instance) for more details.

album.description: The album the music belongs to.

MusicChartType.description: Represents which music chart to pull entries from, if any

triangles.description: The total number of triangles in the object's mesh.

vertices.description: The total number of vertices in the object's mesh.

ObjectMeshSummary.description: Provides a summary of the mesh characteristics of an object, such as triangle and vertex counts.

scriptCount.description: The number of scripts that are in the plugin.

imagePreviewAssets.description: Ordered list of image preview asset ids.

videoPreviewAssets.description: Ordered list of video preview asset ids.

PreviewAssetsModel.description: Grouped preview asset ids for an item, separated by media type.

appliedFacets.description: Facets that are already applied to the search.

availableFacets.description: The unused and still available facets.

QueryOptionConfigElement.description: Deserialization for nested objects of DefaultQueryOptions.QueryOptions array in appsettings

SearchAudioTypeModel.description: Represents audio type values that will be properly displayed in Swagger UI.

SearchCategoryType.description:
This represents a "subset" of Toolbox.Service.CategoryType options and represent the full set
of "categories" (or asset types) that can be searched upon from the toolbox search API.

nextPageToken.description: The page token to view the next page of results.

queryFacets.description: The applied and available facets of a query.

creatorStoreAssets.description: The list of creator store assets returned by the search query.

totalResults.description: The total number of results for the given search query.

filteredKeyword.description: The filtered keyword that was used to search for assets, if applicable.

SearchCreatorStoreAssetsResponse.description: The response for the SearchCreatorStoreAssets endpoint.

SearchView.description:
This view controls which fields are populated in the search response. A lighter
view will result in faster response times and higher reliability.

linkType.description: Gets or sets the link type.

SortCategory.description: The category to sort the search results by.

SortDirection.description: Represents the direction in which to sort the results

SoundEffect.description: Representation of a sound effect asset.

correctionState.description: The state of spell correction: Toolbox.Service.CorrectionState

correctedQuery.description: The spell corrected query if available.

userQuery.description: The user query that originated the correction.

displayName.description: The display name of the subcategory.

hidden.description: Whether this category should be hidden in client side lists

searchKeywords.description: The search keywords to use for this subcategory

queryParams.description: The parameters we'll use when getting assets

path.description: The full path of the subcategory

index.description: The index/order of the subcategory in the list

children.description: The children nested under this subcategory.

thumbnail.description: Optional thumbnail information for the subcategory

categoryPath.description: The taxonomy slug for this subcategory. e.g. "3d__characters"

assetSubTypes.description: A list of subtypes to use (e.g. MaterialPack, Ad, etc.)

excludeAssetSubTypes.description: A list of subtype to remove https://jira.rbx.com/browse/STM-2597.

audioTypes.description: A list of audio types to include (e.g. Music, SoundEffect, Unknown).

categoryPath.description: The taxonomy category path slug to use for category filtering

SubcategoryQueryParams.description:
The parameters we'll use when querying assets
NOTE: All fields *must* be nullable to avoid improper filtering

assetId.description: The asset id to use for the thumbnail image

backgroundColor.description: The color to use for the background gradient, in hex format, ex: #FFFFFF

SubcategoryThumbnail.description:
Data class representing a subcategory thumbnail
These property names are lower-case because obelix doesn't support DataContract/DataMember yet

searchResultSource.description: Search result source eg SemanticScann, lexical

ToolboxItem.description: The model of an toolbox item

previousPageCursor.description: Gets or sets the exclusive start key for the previous page of results.

nextPageCursor.description: Gets or sets the exclusive start key for the next page of results.

data.description: Gets or sets the data of the array.

ToolboxItemApiPageResponse.description: The API standard pagination response. This is supposed to only be used for public endpoints.

filteredKeyword.description: Gets or sets the filtered version of the query's filtered keyword

searchDebugInfo.description: Gets or sets the search infra debug info

spellCheckerResult.description: Gets or sets the result of the spell checker

queryFacets.description: Gets or sets the applied and available facets of a query.

imageSearchStatus.description: Gets or sets the status of image search, conveying whether the search succeeded or hit any errors.

upVotePercent.description: The percentage of total votes that have been UpVotes

roblox-legacy-cookie.description: A browser cookie that represents the identity of a Roblox user. DO NOT SHARE THIS. Sharing this will allow someone to log in as you and to steal your Robux and items. When possible, use API keys with the x-api-key header or OAuth 2.0 instead for authentication.
roblox-legacy-cookie.name: .ROBLOSECURITY

roblox-api-key.description: A configurable key that allows granular access to Roblox resources. See https://create.roblox.com/docs/cloud/auth/api-keys for more information.
roblox-api-key.name: x-api-key
